resources.string: "Tap on square to insert corresponding tag in the message. The words marked in BLUE will be replaced with the respective fields while sending the message."
"To send mail, you must log in to a valid gmail\naccount from which you want to send mails\nautomatically."

"Sir,

This is to inform you that we "<SenAccName>" has sent an RTGS payment of <TransAmount> to your account <RecAccName>, <RecBank> branch. Kindly acknowledge the same for our confirmation purpose.

Thank you

Yours,
<SenAccName>
